verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Friend of sinners, Lord of truth,
I am falling in love with You;
Friend of sinners, Lord of truth,
I have fallen in love with You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, I love Your name,
The name by which we're saved;
Jesus, I love Your name,
The name by which we're saved.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Friend of sinners, Lord of truth,
I am giving my life to You;
Friend of sinners, Lord of truth,
I have given my life to You.
